name: Pyvideo
body: The code is forked from pyglet project (http://www.pyglet.org/) and requires AVBin library (http://avbin.github.com/AVbin/Home/Home.html) to be installed. Original code was written by and is copyrighed Alex Holkner.
tagline: Python video decoding library using AVBin as a backend
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
